title: Cozy Studio Haven with Modern Perks in Krosno's Old Town
description: This bright and contemporary studio offers the perfect retreat for solo dwellers or couples seeking comfort and simplicity. Spanning 37 sqm, the property maximizes every inch with clever modern design, featuring a private open-plan bedroom and a pristine, full-sized bathroom. The modern façade allows for ample natural light, while engineered heating keeps your home warm year-round. Pets are welcome, making this studio an ideal pick for animal lovers.
neighborhood_description: Nestled within Krosno's Old Town, this neighborhood charms with a peaceful suburban feel enriched by an artistic community. Nature enthusiasts and those with active lifestyles will appreciate the green, open spaces for walking and relaxing outdoors, all within a trendy yet quiet area far from city noise. Easy highway access makes regional travel a breeze.

target_buyer: Ideal for singles or couples—especially those with small pets—seeking a low-maintenance yet up-to-date home with space for play and relaxation.
market_positioning: A rare find in Krosno’s tranquil Old Town, this studio offers standout amenities for the price range, appealing to buyers who value modern comforts and a pet-friendly environment, with quick highway access to travel destinations.
